firmware_update_needed.name: Firmware Needs to be Updated
solutions: Go to a place with reliable WiFi signal and update the drone's firmware.

sensor_compass_calibration.name: Compass Needs Calibration
solutions: Look for the compass calibration option in the remote control, select it and follow the instructions.

sensor_fwd_vision_{UL}_calibration.name: {ENG[UL]} Front Vision Sensors Needs Calibration
solutions: Calibrate the {ENG_LOWER[UL]} front vision sensors using the calibration pattern sheet

using_compass_for_orientation.name: Using Compass for Orientation
solutions: Your drone is configured to use the compass for orientation.
If available, select the 'RTK Orientation' option to ignore the compass data and use the drone's RTK antennae data to determine orientation.
